snippet: Seven demonstrators opposed to the city ban on religious worship in public school buildings were taken into custody.
abstract: Seven demonstrators opposed to the city ban on religious worship in public school buildings were taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 6:26 p.m. | Four pastors, including a member of City Council, were among seven men arrested Thursday morning in front of the city Law Department during a protest of the city's ban on allowing churches to hold worship services in public school buildings, the police and organizers said.

headline.main: Clergymen in Cuffs as Protesters Are Arrested
